bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.description: I'm seeing this in some of the DL4J unit tests that have SameDiff layers: (Such as AttentionLayerTests) <denchmark-code>WARNING: An illegal reflective access operation has occurred WARNING: Illegal reflective access by com.rits.cloning.Cloner (file:/C:/Users/Alex/.m2/repository/uk/com/robust-it/cloning/1.9.3/cloning-1.9.3.jar) to field java.util.TreeSet.m WARNING: Please consider reporting this to the maintainers of com.rits.cloning.Cloner WARNING: Use --illegal-access=warn to enable warnings of further illegal reflective access operations WARNING: All illegal access operations will be denied in a future release </denchmark-code>
